distRforest 1.0.0
  • Get started
  • Reference

Error functions

Source: R/error_funcs.R
error_funcs.Rd

The group of loss functions used to calculate OOB errors.

error_funcs(ytrue, ypred, wcase = 1, method)

dev_poiss(ytrue, ypred, wcase = 1)

dev_gamma(ytrue, ypred, wcase = 1)

wgt_mse(ytrue, ypred, wcase = 1)

mcc(ytrue, ypred, wcase = 1)

Arguments

ytrue

numeric vector of the true target values.
ypred

numeric vector of the predicted target values.
wcase

numeric vector of case weights.
method

string specifying the type of random forest. One of the following: 'anova', 'class', 'poisson', 'gamma' or 'lognormal'.

Functions

  • dev_poiss: Poisson deviance loss function for Poisson regression

  • dev_gamma: Gamma deviance loss function for gamma regression

  • wgt_mse: Weighted mean squared error loss function for anova and lognormal regression

  • mcc: Matthews correlation coefficient for binary classification
